title: Mystery skin not given
body: just bought a mystery skin and shop bugged so i got nothing...a blank picture

replies.body:
Hey Bruxos, 

We're aware of display issues with the store. 

If your RP was dedcuted, but you didn't recieve the content, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll adjust your account properly.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Tef8r54s,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-29T23:07:33.732+0000)
>
> Hey Bruxos, 
> 
> We're aware of display issues with the store. 
> 
> If your RP was dedcuted, but you didn't recieve the content, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll adjust your account properly.

thank you kind sir.
I've submitted a ticket but got no answer thus far.
